pull.title: [qa] httpbasics: Actually test second connection
pull.body:
Currently the test will always return `Tests successful`. :new_moon_with_face: 

(As I am touching this file, I have also marked some byte strings as byte strings explicitly, which is a noop for py2, but helps switching to py3)

events.body: It would be easier to review when separated to two commits.
@paveljanik The bugfix is visible on two lines: `s/out2/out1/g`. If you still want me to split, I am happy to do so.

No need to do that here (it is very simple fix). I did this for the review myself.

ACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/7802/commits/fa24456d0c4cd0f6571bcf3d8f1f51d8d4242a3e

issue.title: pyflakes cleanup
issue.body:
Make the RPC tests pyflakes-clean. fixes #2450 

Includes a fix that upstream had in https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/7802

issue.title: HTTP Server cherries
issue.body:
